“Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever… It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.”
Aaron Siskind

About Me

My name is Azmammed, currently I live in New York. Photography has always been my passion and my favorite hobby. I love taking pictures of nature to capture the world's natural beauty, and later share it with my family and friends.
